divs: Sighting Detailstook my dog out for the last time of the night,it was about 12:15 am june 15. a bright reddish-orange light was in the sky where there is usually no light . i live approx. 1 mile form hoosier park horse racing track,the object seemed to be about 2-3 miles from me in the direction of middletown,indiana which would have put the object close to interstate 69. i watched for about 10 minutes before getting my sony camcorder the object hovered in place for about 30 minutes of which i have video not very good but 30 minutes worth.the object seemed to rotate and shift color along its axis.the object had a top, middle and bottom which appeared to change color sometimes blue to white to orange and pulsing.although the object moved it was very slowly, always staying over the same area.at times it appeared to have a brighter light come from out from it like a spotlight.in the video a small aircraft can be seen flying just under the object,the planes navigation lights clearly visible and flashing.my son came out and watched for about 10 minutes with me.during which time he saw the object change color and pulse. there was no sound from the object.and it was gone in a second no flash just gone.some of the video is shaky but also some good steady footage.the shape was oval but cylindrical hard to really tell because it was so bright and pulsing.this was no aircraft coming straight at me then turning ,was not a helicopter nor a blimp or balloon. this object stayed on station like there was purpose and left when the objective was completed.it made me feel as if being watched.the approach to indianpolis international air port is in the other direction-from the northeast to southwest and the anderson airport approach is from northwest to souhteast but a good 5 miles north of my location.the area of sky observed normally has no air traffic this time of night and no bright stars ever seen in this part of the sky here.at this time i need to convert the video from small dvd camera disk to a normal dvd do not know how to send you the video from my camera directly over the internet but do HAVE 30 MINUTES OF VIDEO
